short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily create cool custom pics for holiday greetings, birthday wishes and other events, cover photos & much more

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use this easy to use pic maker to create cool custom pics to send and share with friends. Use images, photos, texts, effects, overlays etc. to create something awesome and share with others. 

Some cool features are:

* Add multiple photos from your PC or Facebook profile or through a direct link

* Apply Preset Effects to images and Photos. Adjust photo brightness, contrast etc.

* Add overlays and styled texts to create your unique pic.

* Apply nice border and frames to your pic.

* ... and much more

Use the pic maker to create pics for many uses. For example:

GREETING CARDS
----------------------
On holiday seasons and on special occasions like birthdays, anniversaries etc create your unique card and send to your friends.

CUSTOM MESSAGES IN PIC
-----------------------
Now don't just type good morning, good night etc to your friends . Discover a nice pic from the showcase or create your own and share right away with others.

COVER PHOTOS
----------------------
You can also create cover photos for Facbook, Google+ , Twitter etc.

PICS FOR SHARING
------------------
If you find any interesting, funny or creative pic on the web, you can add it to the pic maker and showcase it to share with others.

WALLPAPERS
-------------
Use any picture you like, add custom text and effects and you can also create your unique wallpaper for desktop, mobile phone etc.

AND MUCH MORE..
------------------
With your imagination you can find many more usage for this flexible and easy to use pic maker. Check it out and see what other pics you can make with it.
